about_me.des: I am a Java engineer with website development, Experience in developing web sites and deploying management. Life is a continuous learning process, so work makes me more rigorous, struggle makes my life more colorful. Like to get to know all kinds of friends.

projects.saplatform: Saplatform is a automated service for operations, it has asset management, project release, database access function, it can control mass servers.
projects.jalpc: Jalpc is a simple, beautiful and swift theme for Jekyll. It's pretty minimal, but leverages large type and drastic contrast to make a statement, on all devices.
projects.raspberry: I use Raspberry Pi to realize Smart Home, it can be a home NAS, a web server, a auto downloader, it can report the weather and can monitor the home.

career.nextcode_des: Now I'm at Mai Yaxin, Use java development website, And contact with a lot of outsourcing projects and the use of a wide range of Technology.
career.netease_des: In the second year of the pig bear, I served as head of the Java project, To enhance their own technical experience and management experience.
career.ucloud_des: Here, I started working with business projects, servers, operating systems, And begin to be familiar with the process of website development to server deployment.
career.college_des: At Mar 2013, I graduated from Vocational Training College and started my IT technology tour.
